verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they bring <S%H3947><s%> unto thee pure <S%H2134><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> beaten <S%H3795><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, to cause a lamp <S%H5216><s%> to burn <S%H5927><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

Without <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, shall Aaron <S%H175><s%> keep it in order <S%H6186><s%> from evening <S%H6153><s%> to morning <S%H1242><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.
He shall keep in order <S%H6186><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> upon the pure <S%H2889><s%> candlestick <S%H4501><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and bake <S%H644><s%> twelve <S%H6240><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>: two tenth parts of an ephah <S%H6241><s%> shall be in one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H7760><s%> them in two <S%H8147><s%> rows <S%H4634><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> on a row <S%H4635><s%>, upon the pure <S%H2889><s%> table <S%H7979><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> upon each row <S%H4635><s%>, that it may be to the bread <S%H3899><s%> for a memorial <S%H234><s%>, even an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Every sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day he shall set it <S%H3117><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>; it is on the behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And it shall be for Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>; and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in a holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>: for it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto him of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> by a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute <S%H2706><s%>.

And the son <S%H1121><s%> of an Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, whose father <S%H1121><s%> was an Egyptian <S%H376><s%>, went out <S%H3318><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman and a man <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> strove together <S%H5327><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>:

and the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Israelitish <S%H3482><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> blasphemed <S%H5344><s%> the Name <S%H8034><s%>, and cursed <S%H7043><s%>; and they brought <S%H935><s%> him unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>. And his mother <S%H517><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Shelomith <S%H8019><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Dibri <S%H1704><s%>, of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>.
And they put <S%H3240><s%> him in ward <S%H4929><s%>, that it might be declared <S%H6567><s%> unto them at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> him that hath cursed <S%H7043><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>; and let all that heard <S%H8085><s%> him lay <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>, and let all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> stone him <S%H7275><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Whosoever <S%H376><s%> curseth <S%H3588><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his sin <S%H2399><s%>.

And he that blasphemeth <S%H5344><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>; all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall certainly <S%H7275><s%> stone <S%H7275><s%> him <S%H1616><s%>: as well the sojourner, as the home-born <S%H249><s%>, when he blasphemeth <S%H5344><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H4191><s%>, shall be put to death.
And he <S%H376><s%> that smiteth any <S%H5315><s%> man <S%H120><s%> mortally <S%H5221><s%> shall surely <S%H4191><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
And he that smiteth a beast <S%H5315><s%> mortally <S%H5221><s%> shall make it good <S%H7999><s%>, life <S%H5315><s%> for life <S%H5315><s%>.
And if a man <S%H376><s%> cause <S%H5414><s%> a blemish <S%H3971><s%> in his neighbor <S%H5997><s%>; as he hath done <S%H6213><s%>, so shall it be done to him <S%H6213><s%>:

breach <S%H7667><s%> for breach <S%H7667><s%>, eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye <S%H5869><s%>, tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth <S%H8127><s%>; as he hath caused <S%H5414><s%> a blemish <S%H3971><s%> in a man <S%H120><s%>, so shall it be rendered unto him <S%H5414><s%>.
And he that killeth <S%H5221><s%> a beast <S%H929><s%> shall make it good <S%H7999><s%>: and he that killeth <S%H5221><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.
Ye shall have one <S%H259><s%> manner of law <S%H4941><s%>, as well for the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>, as for the home-born <S%H249><s%>: for I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they brought forth <S%H3318><s%> him that had cursed <S%H7043><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and stoned <S%H7275><s%> him with stones <S%H7275><s%>. And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
